com.psddev.cms.tool

Class ToolPageContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • com.psddev.dari.util.HtmlWriter
        • com.psddev.dari.util.WebPageContext
          • com.psddev.cms.tool.ToolPageContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class ToolPageContext
extends com.psddev.dari.util.WebPageContext
    WebPageContext with extra methods that work well with pages in Tool.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • writeMultipleTypeSelect

        public void writeMultipleTypeSelect(Iterable<com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectType> types,
                           Collection<com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectType> selectedTypes,
                           Object... attributes)
                             throws IOException
        Writes a <select> tag that allows the user to pick multiple content types.
        Parameters:
        types - Types that the user is allowed to select from. If null, all content types will be available.
        selectedTypes - Types that should be initially selected.
        attributes - Attributes for the <select> tag.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeTypeSelect

        public void writeTypeSelect(Iterable<com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectType> types,
                   com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectType selectedType,
                   String allLabel,
                   Object... attributes)
                     throws IOException
        Writes a <select> tag that allows the user to pick a content type.
        Parameters:
        types - Types that the user is allowed to select from. If null, all content types will be available.
        selectedType - Type that should be initially selected.
        allLabel - Label for the option that selects all types. If null, the option won't be available.
        attributes - Attributes for the <select> tag.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeObjectSelect

        public void writeObjectSelect(com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectField field,
                     Object value,
                     Object... attributes)
                       throws IOException
        Writes a <select> or <input> tag that allows the user to pick a content.
        Parameters:
        field - Can't be null.
        value - Initial value. May be null.

        IOException

      • disableFormFields

      • tryStandardUpdate

        public boolean tryStandardUpdate(Object object)
        Tries to apply a standard set of updates to the given object if the user has asked for any in the current request.

        This method calls the following methods in order:

        • tryDelete(java.lang.Object)
        • tryRestore(java.lang.Object)
        • trySave(java.lang.Object)
        • tryTrash(java.lang.Object)
        Parameters:
        object - Can't be null.
        Returns:
        true if the trash is tried.
